content: The Tiger's Acolyte is an optional Yaoguai Chief miniboss that you can encounter in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. As an optional foe, you can seek out this boss in the Yellow Wind Formation high above on the Windrest Hamlet's bridge at the back of the region. He is required to defeat to unlock a secret boss using an item he drops.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger's_Acolyte.md', within the main section titled 'Tiger's Acolyte'.
The content is as follows:
The Tiger's Acolyte is an optional Yaoguai Chief miniboss that you can encounter in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. As an optional foe, you can seek out this boss in the Yellow Wind Formation high above on the Windrest Hamlet's bridge at the back of the region. He is required to defeat to unlock a secret boss using an item he drops.
